content: layers of warm wool are a must up here in the quiet cold misty climes of the pacific northwest these ultra-cozy armwarmers with deep decadent sidewinding cables are the perfect accessory for the weather bluefaced leicester wool is just the perfect fiber for these fingerless gloves soft enough for next-to-skin wear and durable enough for busy hands hand-dyed and handspun by the spinsters of spincycle yarns this colorway is a stunner info is also available in the pattern for fiber requirements if you want to spin your own one size stretches generously to fit arms up to 12 circumference
